content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the shine like a diamond tank top is the perfect way to beat the heat this summer all while looking and feeling your best it s a fun beginner crochet pattern with a **video tutorial** the filet diamond pattern allows just enough peak through to add a mature look with the perfect amount of whimsy after you make your first one i know you are going to want to make one in all the colors pattern pack discounts use code save10 for 10% off two patterns save15 for 15% off 3 patterns save20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns cannot be combined with other offers video tutorial https //youtu be/lywjpvar7nu 1 crochet hook size c 2 75 mm crochet hooks or size to obtain gauge notions removable stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends scissors 2 7-9 buttons 3/8 to 1/2 inch yarn & yardage wecrochet comfy fingering 3 55% pima cotton 25% acrylic 218 yds/50g or wecrochet stroll fingering weight 4 75% fine superwash merino wool 25% nylon 231yds/50g extra small 540 yard 494 m - 3 balls small 560 yards 512 m - 3 balls medium 680 yards 621 m - 3 balls large 830 yards 759 m - 4 balls 1x 950 yards 869 m - 5 balls 2x 1150 yards 1052 m - 5 balls 3x 1300 yards 1189 m - 6 balls abbreviations/stitches chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet dc3tog - double_crochet three together rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet stsc-dc3tog - stacked single_crochet 3 together ws - wrong side gauge 26 sts x 13 row = 4×4 inches in double_crochet skill level easy beginner size/measurements this is the finished bust measurement of the garment extra small 28 5 72 cm small 31 79 cm medium 33 84 cm large 36 91 cm 1x 41 104 cm 2x 47 119 cm 3x 52 132 cm this pattern is available on the blog for free let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2022 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome
